secondary_school.name: Liceo Linguistico Internazionale Galileo Galilei Firenze

client_description.Summary Note:
Rizzo Ricci Esposito and the RM met at a financial seminar in Rome. They attended several workshops together and exchanged ideas on market trends, which sparked a long-term professional relationship.
Rizzo Ricci Esposito is a 22 year old and comes from Italy.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced he to join.
client_description.Family Background: Rizzo Ricci Esposito is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description.Education Background:
Rizzo received his secondary school diploma from Liceo Linguistico Internazionale Galileo Galilei Firenze in 2022.
Rizzo attended European University of Rome and graduated in 2025.
client_description.Occupation History:
Rizzo Ricci Esposito is a 22 year old and comes from Italy.
Rizzo Ricci Esposito did not start his professional career yet.
client_description.Wealth Summary:
He did not save any money from his earnings.
Client does not have any properties.
Following the passing of his grandfather, a successful Investment Banker, he received an inheritance of 1370000 EUR in 2019, which he has used to secure his financial future.
client_description.Client Summary: The RM is looking forward to supporting the client in building a successful career and achieving financial stability.
